OperationWithHighCostInLoop.description:
Description

This rule finds method calls inside loops that are known to be likely a performance issue. These methods should be
called only once before the loop.

Schema class methods likeSchema.getGlobalDescribe()andSchema.describeSObjects()might be slow depending on the size of your organization. Calling these methods repeatedly inside a loop creates
a potential performance issue.
